archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: APADC Gateway
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Automated Payment Advance Data Capture (AP-ADC) scripts running in the terminal send XML to CDP via the AP-ADC gateway PDC
AP-ADC was developed as a generic capability on the back of a transaction implementation - making the solution configurable through reference data in order to enable re-use. The AP-ADC toolset has grown as new requirements have originated through the implementation of new transactions - all following the principle of re-use and configuration.
